title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.8 - Alternative standards and specifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.8 - Alternative standards and specifications

State Regulations

Any municipal corporation or public authority may
establish its arm alternative standards and specifications for vests, provided
that the following conditions are complied with: (a) Such standards and specifications shall
be at least as stringent as those adopted by this Part. (b) Such standards and specifications shall
be submitted to the commissioner for review, and shall be approved by the
commissioner prior to the effective date of such standards and
specifications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6030.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
